body:
Looking at how the conversation evolved here, I think it is worthwhile to keep the issue open as a reminder to document how to build a pipeline around the stages of a build system. The particular issue that @davydden was encountering will be solved differently by #4470 

----

##### Original post from @davydden 

I probably missed that, but is there some documentation on how to use arbitrary stages in build, recently contributed by @alalazo ? 

I am just trying to figure out how to add a stage which should run `filter_file()` after installation of the package?
title: Document 'run_after' and 'run_before' decorators
